display_long_description:
⭐️ “VR already has some exceptionally well-received games, like Waltz of the Wizard” - Rolling Stone Magazine
🏆 Winner of Best Innovation - NYX Game Awards
⭐️ “Aldin helped pioneer VR as we know it today” - RtoVR

Experience awesome magical powers in a world inspired by the atmosphere of classic fantasy fiction! Combine arcane ingredients into a boiling cauldron with the help of your torturable skull assistant—the most interactive character you can find in VR—embarking on an adventure in an absurdly interactive and mysterious world.

[media]
**💀MEET THE MOST INTERACTIVE CHARACTER IN VR**

Skully is VR’s most interactive character with hundreds of voicelines and enormous amount of unique reactions to what you say, gaze, communicative gestures along with awareness of everything you do.

[media]
**🪄AWESOME VARITY OF INTERACTIONS & MAGIC**

Unleash your inner wizard—summon fireballs, bend time, transform objects into frogs, or even grow to the size of a giant, to name just a few.

[media]
**🎙️BLAZINGLY FAST VOICE POWERS**

Use hundreds of voice interactions with blazingly fast responsiveness using your own voice! (English only) Summon objects, magic and enemies and change their abilities and physics using only a few words.

[media]
**🏰EMBARK ON AN ADVENTURE**

Your adventure unfolds in a richly woven tapestry of dark humor, mystery, and strange situations. Find yourself navigating a world filled with enchanted curiosities and eerie secrets, where funny mischievous moments blend with the thrill of crawling through the Observer Fortress. 

[media]
